医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ACBI3分子为靶向癌症KRAS突变提供了新希望KRAS 是癌症中突变最严重的基因，突变发生在所有癌症的 17%–25% 中，影响着全球数百万患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/ACBI3-molecule-offers-new-hope-for-targeting-KRAS-mutations-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/ACBI3-molecule-offers-new-hope-for-targeting-KRAS-mutations-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3dc8a7e-9798-4cef-bc06-42f2da7cae3f Mon, 23 Sep 2024 15:50:35 -0400 ACBI3 molecule offers new hope for targeting KRAS mutations in cancer
数字医疗投资可以使数百万人免受非传染性疾病的侵害美国疾病预防控制中心联合发布的一份新报告称，目前每年对每位患者额外投资 0.24 美元用于远程医疗、移动消息和聊天机器人等数字健康干预措施，可以帮助在未来十年内挽救超过 200 万人免受非传染性疾病的伤害。世界卫生组织 (WHO) 和 ITU（国际电信联盟）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Digital-health-investment-could-save-millions-from-noncommunicable-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Digital-health-investment-could-save-millions-from-noncommunicable-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5dc902-1e9b-427d-b499-56bf0c1010b6 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 15:39:33 -0400 Digital health investment could save millions from noncommunicable diseases
世卫组织呼吁采取行动支持青少年心理和性健康世界卫生组织 (WHO) 发布的一份新科学出版物显示，全球近 13 亿青少年（10-19 岁）迫切需要增加投资，以应对不断变化的健康风险，满足心理、性和生殖健康需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/WHO-calls-for-action-to-support-adolescent-mental-and- Sex-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/WHO-calls-for-action-to-support-adolescent-mental-and- Sex-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9625677d-a849-4785-b553-ec0d32eff582 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 15:36:27 -0400 WHO calls for action to support adolescent mental and sexual health
新的除颤策略可以提高心脏骤停的存活率医学博士约书亚·拉普顿 (Joshua Lupton) 对 2016 年自己的心脏骤停没有任何记忆。他只知道急救人员用除颤器电击使他的心脏复苏，最终使他完全康复，并使他成为全国不到十分之一的人之一。在医院外心脏骤停中幸存下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-defibrillation-strategy-could-enhance-survival-rates-in-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-defibrillation-strategy-could-enhance-survival-rates-in-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b79aa038-2d25-4685-bf57-7f3292bfcda4 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:36:58 -0400 New defibrillation strategy could enhance survival rates in cardiac arrest
NIH 奖励 540 万美元用于将基因组学整合到学习健康系统中美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 将提供 540 万美元的第一年资金，用于建立一个新项目，支持将基因组学整合到学习健康系统中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/NIH-awards-54-million-for-genomics-integration-in-learning-health-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/NIH-awards-54-million-for-genomics-integration-in-learning-health-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b8277d-0baf-4614-b023-63f57e1d1951 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:25:21 -0400 NIH awards 5.4 million for genomics integration in learning health systems
新的 CRISPR 模型可更深入地了解前列腺癌转移使用 CRISPR（一种允许科学家切割和编辑基因的先进技术）的新临床前模型使威尔康奈尔医学研究人员及其同事对前列腺癌如何扩散或转移有了更深入的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-CRISPR-model-offers-deeper-insight-into-prostate-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/New-CRISPR-model-offers-deeper-insight-into-prostate-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbf084c5-1a64-4ba7-a330-771b07d6b9db Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:17:33 -0400 New CRISPR model offers deeper insight into prostate cancer metastasis
研究表明大流行时期儿童的自闭症风险并未增加哥伦比亚大学瓦格洛斯内科医生和外科医生学院的研究人员发现，在大流行第一年出生的儿童，包括那些在子宫内接触过新冠病毒的儿童，与未接触过新冠病毒或大流行前的儿童相比，自闭症筛查结果呈阳性的可能性并不高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-shows-no-increased-autism-risk-for-pandemic-era-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Study-shows-no-increased-autism-risk-for-pandemic-era-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5276f752-f8cc-4560-a659-83fe98b7eb17 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:10:07 -0400 Study shows no increased autism risk for pandemic-era children
远程医疗提高护理质量和医生满意度纽约州立大学宾厄姆顿大学的最新研究表明，远程医疗实际上提高了护理质量，并提高了医生对提供护理的满意度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Telemedicine-enhances-care-quality-and-physician-satisfaction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Telemedicine-enhances-care-quality-and-physical-satisfaction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7205b77-5d90-459d-928a-f760d5d3a281 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 14:03:54 -0400 Telemedicine enhances care quality and physician satisfaction
迫切呼吁对抗生素研究进行长期投资抗生素耐药性是全球公共卫生威胁。现代卫生系统依靠抗生素来预防和治疗感染，对新药的需求迫切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Urgent-call-for-long-term-investment-in-antibiotic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Urgent-call-for-long-term-investment-in-antibiotic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65c658eb-9edb-4f50-b390-95fc0b03ed9d Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:44:00 -0400 Urgent call for long-term investment in antibiotic research
热疹疾病相关病毒病原体的流行病学宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。本研究的目的是监测与热性皮疹疾病 (FRI) 相关的病毒病原体谱及其流行病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Epidemiology-of-viral-pathogens-involved-in-febrile-rash-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240923/Epidemiology-of-viral-pathogens-involved-in-febrile-rash-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d4df1d5-0a65-49c4-b91e-421d537140b9 Mon, 23 Sep 2024 12:28:30 -0400 Epidemiology of viral pathogens involved in febrile rash illness
